results.name: Expansion of 1/(1-3*x)^7; 7-fold convolution of A000244 (powers of 3).
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..400
program: (Sage) lucas_number2(n, 3, 0)*binomial(n,6)/729 for n in range(6, 26)] # _Zerinvary Lajos_, Mar 10 2009
